attributes.action: change the law protecting the identity of convicted criminals under 18 in the media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Minors between the age of 12 and 18 convicted of a crime aren't allowed to be named in the media. This petition will allow those convicted to be named and shamed

rejection.details:
Similar petitions already exist eg:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NameOffenders/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/hoodieyobs/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
